item.title: The music
item.description: Development on the game engine has been slow this past week so this week Iâ€™ve been thinking about the background music for the game. I donâ€™t know the actual graphical style of the game just yet but I think I narrowed down the musical style to either some slow form of swing/jazz like this: Or some some ambient 80â€™s style electro music like this. Given the Iâ€™ve already found some electro music that seems to be fitting and that lander used some similar music pieces, itâ€™s safe to assume that I will be using that electro music during the early alpha builds.

item.title: Foobar sorting
item.description: Since some time Iâ€™ve been sorting my music collection. Going though my hard-drives and Cdâ€™s finding all music-files and moving them to a common place and with the help of foobar2000 place them in a sane directory-structure and keep them there. Within foobar I sort the artists on the following script. This makes sure that The (International) Noise Conspiracy is among the other artist that begins with I. $replace($replace($replace($stripprefix(%artist%),â€™|â€™,),'[â€˜,),'(â€˜,) That little script keeps things nice and tidy within foobar, but to sort I use these two massive scripts:
